Consultant Beautycounter April 2014  – Present (1 year 5 months) Remote On a mission to make the world safer while enjoying the perks of working with a revolutionary direct retail company.  
 
Beautycounter's the social mission is inseparable from the brand: We educate families about the need for safer chemicals and products, and work to bring about much needed change to the beauty industry and to our lives.  
 
Sustainability, animal welfare and corporate social responsibility are important to Beautycounter.  
 
More than a line of great personal care products, Beautycounter is a movement. Empowering women, challenging the current beauty industry and improving the way we look and feel. 
 
At Beautycounter, every day is an opportunity to: 
Educate families about toxic chemicals 
Create safe and effective products 
Provide an economic opportunity through direct retail 
 
Beautycounter’s screening process is unlike any other in the beauty industry— we evaluate every ingredient that goes into our products, asking ourselves: 
 
Is it safe?  
Do we need it?  
Does it perform/work? 
 
Beautycounter believes in environmental health education and advocating for better consumer choices. To that end, Beautycounter works with these trusted nonprofit organizations: 
 
The Environmental Working Group (EWG) 
The Campaign for Safe Cosmetics 
Healthy Child Healthy World 
 
We will never exploit industry loopholes that allow companies to keep secrets. We tell you everything. 
 
The Beautycounter story is best told friend to friend. Our social selling platform enables entrepreneurship and creates an exceptional business opportunity, allowing women to earn income while selling products they can believe in.
